**English Virtual Language Training for Central Region**

**Procurement Reference Number:** PW-23-01023440

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer

**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding

**Project Description:**
The Government of Canada intends to issue a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for English virtual language training in the Central Region. The training will be delivered in the following streams:

1. Full-Time (Group and Individual)
2. Part-Time (Group and Individual)
3. Learner Assessment
4. Tutoring for Preparation to the Second Language Evaluation Tests
5. Group Conversation

**Services Overview:**
The virtual language training will be provided on request through a Call-up made pursuant to the Standing Offer. The training will take place during business hours for employees residing in the Central Region (Quebec, Ontario, Manitoba, and National Capital Region).

**Contract Duration:**
The initial Standing Offer will have a duration of two (2) years, with three (3) irrevocable options to extend the period by one year each.

**Request for Standing Offers:**
The Government of Canada intends to establish Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the requirement detailed in the RFSO across Canada, excluding locations within Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, and Labrador that are subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs).

**Security Requirements:**
There are security requirements associated with this requirement. For additional information, please consult Part 6 – Security and Part 7 - Standing Offer and Resulting Contract Clauses.

**Required Documents:**
The Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) document, including all amendments, may be downloaded from the Canada Buy Services website. The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**
For information regarding this procurement, please contact:
Rabouin, Mimi
nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
